trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Washington Court House
There were no other sightings in Washington Court House on or around February 21st 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving Southbound on U.S. 62 just North of Bloomingburg when I saw a dark orange streak in the South East sky (towards Chillicothe) very high in the atmosphere. The ball of light disappeared, and a few seconds later reappeared for about 2 seconds in the same spot that it disappeared from initially and then completely disappeared. No "comtrail" was visable after the object disappeared.
